author: donaldp
msg: Do not work with URL objects anymore as they require that the URLStreamHandlerFa
ctory already be installed. Thus we now work with strings.

author: donaldp
msg: Do not work with URL objects anymore as they require that the URLStreamHandlerFactory already be installed. Thus we now work with strings.

author: donaldp
msg: DefaultClassLoader manager now has to provide URLStreamHandlerFactory to PolicyClassLoader so that it can load "sar:" urls.
Add javadocs to make it's behaviour easier to understand.

author: donaldp
msg: Made PolicyClassLoader manager take URLStreamHandlerFactory in constructor.

author: donaldp
msg: The embeddor no longer sets the JVM wide HandlerFactory. It is now the responsibility of ClassLoaderManager.
